attributes.additional_details: 1.47 billion pounds given to China for the support of their elderly and our elders in this country having to sell their homes. Hundreds of millions of pounds given to countries where corruption is rampant.
attributes.background: 14 Billion pound is far to high to give to other countries for the welfare for their people when we in this country have our own people and the country would benefit from tax money raised from our people going to support our people.
